ing.item: BY 26 INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 350 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. SPREAD ABOUT 3 1/2 QT FILLING IN EACH GREASED SHEET PAN. SPRINKLE LEMON JUICE ON TOP OF MIXTURE IN EACH PAN.
2. COMBINE CAKE MIX AND COCONUT; ADD BUTTER OR MARGARINE; MIX UNTIL CRUMBLY.
3. SPRINKLE ABOUT 2 3/4 QT MIXTURE OVER EACH PAN.
4. BAKE 50 MINUTES OR UNTIL LIGHTLY BROWNED.
5. CUT 6 BY 9.
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 1, USE 14 LB (2-N0. 10 CN) CANNED PREPARED APPLE PIE FILLING OR PREPARE 1/2 RECIPE APPLE PIE (RECIPE NOS. I08003, I09001, AND I09002).
NOTE: 2. IN STEP 1, 8 OZ LEMONS A.P. (2 LEMONS) WILL YIELD 6 TBSP JUICE.
NOTE: 3. IN STEP 2, 5 LB WHITE CAKE MIX MAY BE USED.
NOTE: 4. IN STEP 2, 1 LB (2 CUPS) CHOPPED UNSALTED NUTS MAY BE USED FOR COCONUT.
Recipe Number: J02701
SERVING SIZE: 1 PIECE
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
